technical.name: JavaScript
technical.description: Proficient in modern JavaScript (ES6+), including async/await, promises, and functional programming concepts.

technical.name: Vue.js
technical.description: Experienced with Vue.js framework, including Vue 3 composition API, Vuex for state management, and Vue Router.

technical.name: HTML/CSS
technical.description: Expert in semantic HTML5 and modern CSS techniques including Flexbox, Grid, and CSS animations.

technical.name: Node.js
technical.description: Strong knowledge of server-side JavaScript using Node.js, including Express framework and RESTful API development.

technical.name: Git
technical.description: Proficient with Git version control, including branching strategies, merge conflict resolution, and collaborative workflows.

soft.name: Communication
soft.description: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, able to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

soft.name: Problem Solving
soft.description: Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a methodical approach to debugging and troubleshooting.

soft.name: Teamwork
soft.description: Collaborative team player with experience in agile development environments and cross-functional teams.

soft.name: Time Management
soft.description: Effective at prioritizing tasks, meeting deadlines, and managing multiple projects simultaneously.

soft.name: Adaptability
soft.description: Quick learner who adapts well to new technologies, methodologies, and changing project requirements.
